Name: Hot Red Blooded Frenchman
Ingredients: 30 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Place bar spoon in warmed glass. Add other ingredients and STIR.
Review: Warm, fruity red wine - great on a cold night.
Nutrition: One serving of Hot Red Blooded Frenchman contains 161 calories
